title: Mauritius Core Inflation Rate
description: Core consumer prices in Mauritius increased 7.50 percent in October of 2022 over the same month in the previous year. Core Inflation Rate in Mauritius averaged 3.11 percent from 2007 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 8.30 percent in July of 2022 and a record low of 0.80 percent in January of 2015. This page provides the latest reported value for - Mauritius Core Inflation Rate - plus previous releases, historical high and low, short-term forecast and long-term prediction, economic calendar, survey consensus and news.
author: The Central Bank of Mauritius
